author: timesunion.com
title: Today's Birthdays
text:
Photo: Matt Sayles Image 1 of / 1   1 Actor Tony Shalhoub arrives at the LA Premiere of "Pain and Gain" at the TCL Theatre on Monday, April 22, 2013 in Hollywood, Calif. (Photo by Matt Sayles/Invision/AP)
Photo: Matt Sayles Actor Tony Shalhoub arrives at the LA Premiere of "Pain and Gain"... Today's Birthdays 1  /  1 Back to Gallery Actor Tony Shalhoub is 62. Actor Fyvush Finkel is 93. Retired MLB All-Star Joe Pepitone is 75. Former Sen. Trent Lott , R-Miss., is 74. C-SPAN founder Brian Lamb is 74. Rhythm-and-blues singer Nona Hendryx is 71. Singer Jackson Browne is 67. Nobel Peace laureate Jody Williams is 65. Actor Gary Frank is 65. Actress-TV personality Sharon Osbourne is 63. Actor Scott Bakula is 61. Musician James Fearnley (The Pogues) is 61. Pro and College Football Hall of Famer Mike Singletary is 57. Movie director Guillermo del Toro is 51. British Prime Minister David Cameron is 49. Singer P.J. Harvey is 46. Movie director Steve McQueen (Film: "12 Years a Slave") is 46. World Golf Hall of Famer Annika Sorenstam is 45. Actress Cocoa Brown is 43. Actor Steve Burns is 42. Rock singer Sean Lennon is 40. Country singer Scotty McCreery (TV: "American Idol") is 22.
